title: POSCO Net Profit Plunged 53% on Year in 3Q
text:
By Kwanwoo Jun

Posco's (005490.SE) third-quarter net profit fell sharply on year due to sluggish demand for steel, as global trade tensions continued to weigh on manufacturing sectors.

Net profit for the quarter ended September was 496.80 billion won ($424.4 million) compared with KRW1.058 trillion in the same quarter a year earlier, the South Korean steelmaker said Thursday.

The latest results missed a consensus forecast for net profit of KRW582.81 billion provided by FactSet.

Revenue during the quarter fell 2.6% on year to KRW15.988 trillion.

Operating profit fell 32% on year to KRW1.040 trillion.

Posco said steel markets slowed as automobile, machinery and other manufacturing sectors continued declining as the U.S.-China trade dispute continued.
